name: Infernity Paranoia
effectText: Tribute 1 DARK monster; Special Summon 1 "Infernity" monster from your Deck or GY with the same Level but a different name, but negate its effects. During your Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Infernity" monster in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Infernity Paranoia" per turn.
